replies.bodyText:
The logic here is that we can reduce ingots and stone etc. when used as ingredients, unless the output is ingots or stone etc.
This allows the stonemason to reduce the cobblestone in cobblestone stairs, but not have the crusher reduce the cobblestone in sand, as that's the responsibility of "Gilded Hammer" research.
So, we exclude as a product the things the crusher makes, and both types of storage (ingots/storage blocks) to avoid duplication exploits.
